name: UniqueHA
0:
”Alexa, turn on Outlet”
”Alexa, turn on Bulb”
”Alexa, turn on Bulb Socket”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Unique HA is a smart home skill that allow user to control multiple smart devices individually with Alexa. 

Unique HA 
Step 1. Download & install "Unique HA" from Apple Store or Google Play Store.
Step 2. Sign up a new account. 
Step 3. Setup a new Unique HA device within the App.
Step 4. Make sure the device is controllable . 
Step 5. Go to Alexa App. for Skill setup. 

Alexa App
Step 1. Open Skill Page
Step 2. Search "Unique HA"
Step 3. Click on "Unique HA"
Step 4. Click Enable
Step 5. Login with Unique HA account. 
Step 6. Click Discover Devices or say "Alexa, discover device"
Step 7. Check if your bind device on the list. 
Step 8. Enjoy
